name: Poppler
description: Poppler is a PDF rendering library that also includes a collection of utility binaries, which allows for the manipulation and extraction of data from PDF documents such as converting PDF files to HTML, TXT, or PostScript

pdf2text.name: Extract text from PDF
pdf2text.description: Creates a txt file from PDF.

pdf2images.name: Render PDF as images
pdf2images.description: Renders pages as image files in any resolution.

pdfimages.name: Extract images from PDF (png)
pdfimages.description: Extract images from PDF as png files.
